headline: A Fresh Look at PepsiCo (PEP) Valuation as Investors Await the Next Catalyst
summary: PepsiCo (PEP) shares moved only slightly in the latest session, reflecting limited news around the company. Investors may be watching for upcoming catalysts or signals that could shift the stock’s recent sideways trend. See our latest analysis for PepsiCo. PepsiCo’s share price has slipped nearly 6% so far this year and the 1-year total shareholder return is down 10.3%, reflecting a market that is waiting for convincing signs of momentum.
